con:request.name: ProcessCheck
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Check.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ProcessCheck> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:AbaNumber>${PersonalCheckABA}</acr1:AbaNumber> <acr1:AccountNumber>${PersonalCheckAccount}</acr1:AccountNumber> <acr1:AccountNumberLastFourDigits xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:AccountType>Checking</acr1:AccountType> <acr1:Amount>10</acr1:Amount> <acr1:CheckBackSideImage xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CheckFrontImage xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CheckIssueDate>${CheckIssueDate}</acr1:CheckIssueDate> <acr1:CheckNumber>${PersonalCheckNumber}</acr1:CheckNumber> <acr1:CheckType>Personal</acr1:CheckType> <acr1:CustomerAddress xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerBirthday xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerDriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr1:CustomerFirstName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerLastName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerState>FL</acr1:CustomerState> <acr1:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber> <acr1:Micr xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TransactionType>Conversion</acr1:TransactionType> </tem:request> </tem:ProcessCheck> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
